sentence.Network_en: "You're coming?" he said excitedly. "That's fantastic! That's incredible!"
sentence.Network_cn: “你要来么？”他激动地说，“那太好了！简直难以置信！”

sentence.Network_en: Officials were clustered at every open office door, talking excitedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个开着门的办公室门口都有官员们三五成群在兴奋地交谈。

sentence.Network_en: Marcello sat on his knee and gabbled excitedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 马塞洛跪坐在地上，激动地哇哩哇啦地说着。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 牛津初中英语教材单词表_百度文库 ... purpose n. 目的 * excitedly adv. 兴奋地 Unit 5 *international adj. 国际的.
高中英语第一册词汇表 ... clothing n. (总称)衣服；衣着 excitedly adv. 兴奋地；激动地 as if 好像，好似.
百度词典搜索_兴 ... the mood for sight-seeing 游兴兴冲冲[ with joy and expedition;excitedly] 兴趣[ interest;taste].

list.abs: Tailor said excitedly ., 泰勒激动地说.
excitedly是什么意思|excitedly的中文意思... ... rush excitedly ： 激动地冲 rejoiced excitedly ： 欢喜踊跃.
the rabbi spoke excitedly about the wonders of our country ,, 那名犹太教士兴奋地谈起我们国家的种种奇观,
She was gesturing so excitedly that I knew something was wrong ., 她如此激动地打着手势 , 我就知道出了问题.

entry.def: If you are excited, you are so happy that you cannot relax, especially because you are thinking about something pleasant that is going to happen to you.

example.ex: I'm very excited about the possibility of playing for England's first team...
example.tran: 想到可能为英格兰首屈一指的球队效力，我非常兴奋。

example.ex: I was so excited when I went to sign the paperwork I could hardly write.
example.tran: 去签文件时我非常兴奋，几乎无法写字。

entry.def: If you are excited, you are very worried or angry about something, and so you are very alert and cannot relax.

example.ex: I don't think there's any reason to get excited about inflation...
example.tran: 我认为大可不必为通货膨胀而心烦。

example.ex: Excited voices were shouting that the road was blocked by soldiers.
example.tran: 有人气愤地喊道马路被士兵封锁了。

auth_sentence.content: Excitedly he talked he had so much to say!
auth_sentence.res_content: Excitedly he talked he had so much to say!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Excitedly he talked he had so much to say!

auth_sentence.content: The two men spoke excitedly about the meetings.
auth_sentence.res_content: The two men spoke excitedly about the meetings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two men spoke excitedly about the meetings.

sentences.cn: 兴奋地和她的朋友唠叨
克劳斯兴奋地向他招手示意。

sentences.en: She was gesturing so excitedly that I knew something was wrong.
sentences.cn: 她如此激动地直打手势,我知道出问题了。
